description.en:
[The Candy Store]  
  
“I want to be touched by someone”. Shin Yibeom is responsible for defeating demons that torment his clients inside their dreams. The problem is that the role is expressed through a burning libido…!   
“…I'll help you. I will do anything you want”. Han Jeongwu, a part-timer, has the duty to suppress this burning desire. The touch of their bodies, the pressure of the embrace… and then? “I want to go deeper… deeper”. This is how Joengwu began his work as a part-time assistant for Shin Yibeom!  
  


---

[Fluffy Bear Scans]  
  
"I wish someone… would touch me."  
  
Shin Leebeom, a shaman that exorcises evil spirits that harasses his clients in their dreams, is faced with an unexpected dilemma.   
  
The problem is, the consequence of his role as a shaman manifests in the form of an intense sexual desire…!  
  
"…I'll help you. Do what you want, Shin Leebeom-ssi."  
  
Han Jungoh, a part-timer, follows Leebeom into a dream and ends up taking on the role as the suppressor of the burning libido.  
  
"When our bodies come in contact, then the pressure of our embrace… What's next?"  
  
"Deeper… I want you to go deeper."  
  
How will Leebeom and Jungoh's story unfold?  


---

**Links**:  
- [Official Bomtoon](https://bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/ST_dream)  
- [Official Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2404002279)  
  


---

[Russian Translation]   
  
«Я хочу, чтобы кто-то другой… Прикоснулся к нему».  
  
Однако для решения проблемы избрали Шина Ли Бома, борца со злыми духами, преследовавшими его клиента в снах.  
  
Но у этого дара есть своя цена – необузданное желание секса!..  
  
«Я помогу тебе. Делай все, что Шин от тебя хочет».  
Студент-заочник Ханчжон О следует за Ли Бомом во сне и выполняет миссию, нацеленную усмирить плотские желания.  
  
«Ощущение чужого тела, эти объятия… Что же дальше?  
  
Глубина… Я хочу достичь её».
